overview: The year is 2002 and an invasion of unprecedented magnitude is being perpetrated against our citizens by enigmatic warlords from a distant galaxy. Systematically these alien invaders have taken control of select individuals using a diabolic Sonic Sex Ray. Determined to discover the intentions of this strange invasion, Special Agents Donovan and Summerville are assigned to the case and are instructed to report on any evidence of alien penetration that they might encounter.
title: Hysteria
